text.text_translated: At first, Pi is so terrified of the animals that he jumps into the ocean. However, after remembering there are hungry sharks in the water, he realises his only option is to climb back into the lifeboat. After some time, the animals on the boat kill and eat each other until only Pi and the tiger are left. Fortunately for Pi, the tiger, who he names Richard Parker, is seasick and has no immediate interest in eating him.
